services.title: Professional Data Extraction Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for extracting, processing, and structuring data from any web source. Choose from our range of professional services designed for businesses of all sizes.

hero.title: Extract Data from Any Website with
hero.subtitle: Transform any website into structured data with our intelligent scraping technology. No coding required - just point, click, and extract.
hero.feature_any_website_desc: Extract data from any website, including dynamic content and JavaScript-rendered pages
hero.feature_structured_data_desc: Get clean, structured data in JSON, CSV, or Excel format ready for analysis
hero.feature_ai_powered_desc: Smart extraction that adapts to website changes and handles complex layouts

metadata.title: AI Scraper - Intelligent Web Data Extraction
metadata.description: Transform any website into structured data with our AI-powered scraping technology. No coding required - just point, click, and extract.
